A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have been a fan of Star Wars since I saw A New Hope in 1977 and now that I've had a few hours to process The Last Jedi my spoiler free first impression review is this...it's a fun roller coaster ride but I didn't feel the need to get off of it and jump right back in line to ride it again. That being said I felt like The Little Dutch Boy doing my best trying to plug all of the holes in the plot. I give it one ?? and one ??up. I love it and hated it at the same time. That's about all I have to say for now. I do recommend that every fan of the franchise (obviously) go see the movie....Opinions will vary. It's going to be a battle between old school and new school
